title: Merge and auto-export configfile
author: Walmann
body_snippet:
## Current Behavior
When sharing a config file between two computers it needs to be exported from computer A to Computer B.
You then have to import the config file -> delete the old version -> fix the folder structure (or else you end up with a lot of nested folders).


## Solution: 
Add an option to enable auto export to file whenever a setting have been edited. 
Config info could be saved inside the config file.

Add an option to merge all changes from config file. Either automa...
